arts.ttl: Neil Critchley rages at Hearts 'VAR fiasco' behind Ross County collapse as he makes defiant penalty claim
arts.sum: A late fight back saw the Staggies claim a point at Tynecastle

arts.ttl: Ross County stun Hearts with late comeback to secure unlikely point
arts.sum: Josh Nisbet and Jordan White scored at the death.

arts.ttl: Michael Tidser targeted for next Dunfermline manager as Kelty Hearts grant Pars permission to open talks
arts.sum: The 34-year-old came through the youth ranks at Celtic as a player and is in his first managerial position

arts.ttl: The unsung Hibs hero who inspired famous Hearts win just 24 hours after getting out of hospital
arts.sum: Josh Campbell says kitman Gavin Gillies played a huge role in the win in Gorgie

Two of the Scottish Premiership's bottom three meet in the Highlands, as Ross County host Hearts in Dingwall on Sunday afternoon. Ross County ended a 15-month wait for a Scottish Premiership victory ...

arts.ttl: Zander Clark targeted as Hibs launch transfer raid on rivals Hearts just days after Edinburgh derby win
arts.sum: The Easter Road club have listed the Scotland international as one of several players they are monitoring

arts.ttl: Elton Kabangu is Hearts transfer 'target' as Neil Critchley closes in on loan move for Belgian striker
arts.sum: Neil Critchley is desperate to add firepower to his ranks to shoot the Jambos away from the relegation trouble

arts.ttl: Dwight Gayle reveals how HEARTS fans inspired his Hibs Edinburgh derby heroics
arts.sum: Veteran striker climbed off the bench to net the winner and end a five-year wait for a Hibs win at Tynecastle.

arts.ttl: Lawrence Shankland in brutal Hearts assessment as skipper warns those denying it are lying to themselves
arts.sum: Hearts slumped back into the bottom two with a dismal derby defeat to Hibs and Shankland knows there's real trouble ahead if they can't sort it out

arts.ttl: David Gray reveals Hibs secret behind Hearts derby triumph as bold Christmas Day call pays off big time
arts.sum: The Easter Road boss grabbed the bragging rights in the capital and a huge three points at Tynecastle
